actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend titles II and XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for the payment of wife's husband's, widow's, and widower's insurance benefits without regard to age in cases of disability (and for medicare coverage for those entitled to such benefits).
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides, under titles II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) and XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act, for the payment of wife's, husband's, widow's, and widower's insurance benefits without regard to age in cases of disability (and for medicare coverage for those entitled to such benefits).

titles.title: A bill to amend titles II and XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for the payment of wife's husband's, widow's, and widower's insurance benefits without regard to age in cases of disability (and for medicare coverage for those entitled to such benefits).
